document_data.mainbody:
Dawn MacDare was a bloodforge mage in the Utter East during the time of the Bloodforge Wars (648â€“657 DR).
Dawn desired to take advantage of the Legendary Campaign leaders mission to unify and pacify the Utter East through conquest. Thus, Dawn made camp in the Web Mountains, from which they advanced on the Legendary Campaign forces. However, warned of the attack by the armys southern guard, the leader struck at Dawns forces in a bloodforge battle.
